attributes.action: To Investiagte or enquire as to why there is global warming on Thirty Nine other bodies in our solar system other than earth and to see if we are responsible for the warming their and if not, what is happening and why are we to blame for just the earth.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In an article on the National Geographic website dater 28=2=2007. It was stated that mars is also experiencing a period of global warming as well as thirty nine other bodies in the solar system inc, Gannymede, io, europa, titan, tritan, tethyeis, pluto, neptune and saturn
